tweets.text:
From the latest 'State of Nature in the EU', published this week by the European Environmental Agency. The data were collected between 2013 and 2018. The UK is one of the worst in Europe for habitat conservation.
#data #environment #eu #biodiversity #conservation #habitat https://t.co/YUjup7Yu0t

@SE_Rivers_Trust @WandleForum @thameswater @Wandle_Trust @Feargal_Sharkey @LDNWaterkeeper @EnvAgency It's depressing as it's happened twice now. It would appear they think they can get away with it so just letting it out again, presumably whenever they want...?

There must be some penalty and follow up and accountability otherwise it will keep happening.

tweets.text: @WandleForum @SE_Rivers_Trust @thameswater @Wandle_Trust @Feargal_Sharkey @LDNWaterkeeper @EnvAgency I‚Äôm at top end of Ravensbury Park and this is the second time this week I‚Äôve seen our beautiful river turn into a river of muck.

@WandleForum @thameswater @Wandle_Trust @Feargal_Sharkey @LDNWaterkeeper Please call this in to the @EnvAgency on 0800 80 70 60. Please can you let us know what incident number you are given so that we can follow this up with them? Thank you!

I have expressed concern myself about this proposed decision -see here. Instead I recommend that TEPCO and the ‚Ä¶ [Continue Reading]

tweets.text: Despite a challenging year, barriers to fish migration are still being tackled. Slitting Mill weir has been removed as part of the HLF Hidden Rivers Secret Streams project, led by Don Catchment Rivers Trust. This area of the project was funded via the Rotherham Rivers ll project. https://t.co/f2LM0VK5ug

All a bit odd. 1 year after your director of ops joins the board of a water industry lobbying org and a month before he jumps ship to a commercial rival you finally advertise his job.

Presume he did work his notice period / gardening leave?

Or just more @EnvAgency incompetence? https://t.co/56elMiDH1m

tweets.text: @SCRiversTrust have started a community monitoring programme on the 90 hectare #nfm site above Staveley. This is an ace initiative that makes all the right connections between providers, benficiaries, enablers, researchers and funders. 10/10! @NERC_QNFM @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/od80MoveP6

We‚Äôre so happy, our second NATIONAL NATURE RESERVE, well done and thank you to everyone who helped to make this happen @FriendsofSaltwellsNatureReserve @NE_WestMids @canalrivertrust @EnvAgencyMids
 and our amazing volunteers. 
WE DID IT, THANK YOU!!!!! Here's our best bits! https://t.co/UKkbTc2NjZ

Our new river site from the air, new habitats establishing & public access track nearly complete. A fantastic community effort at our @EPIC_Sompting project. Cleaner water and inspired community thanks to @HeritageFundL_S  @EnvAgencySE  @SussexGiving @SomptingDowns https://t.co/i6ukX73EzA

@MarcLidderthEA @EnvAgencyMids Amazing structures...

Water companies are proud to be part of this project & are providing #wastewater samples to help detect local outbreaks.

We will continue to do everything we can to fight #COVID19 & help keep our customers, & the communities we serve, safe.

@EnvAgency
